name: Organigram Holdings Inc.
description: Organigram Holdings Inc. is a Canadian licensed producer of cannabis and a leader in the cannabis industry, specializing in the production of high-quality, indoor-grown cannabis products. Founded in 2013 and headquartered in Moncton, New Brunswick, Organigram has quickly established itself as a reputable player in the rapidly evolving cannabis market. The company offers a diverse range of products, including dried flower, pre-rolls, oils, and edibles, catering to both the medical and recreational cannabis sectors. With a commitment to innovation and quality, Organigram employs advanced cultivation techniques and state-of-the-art facilities to enhance its product offerings. The company's mission is to provide consumers with safe, reliable, and effective cannabis products while adhering to the highest standards of quality and compliance. Organigram also prioritizes sustainability, implementing environmentally responsible practices in its operations. As the cannabis industry continues to grow, Organigram is focused on expanding its market presence and product portfolio, aiming to meet the evolving needs of its customers and capitalize on new opportunities both domestically and internationally.

seo.meta_title: Organigram Holdings Inc. | Premium Cannabis Producer
seo.meta_description: Discover Organigram Holdings Inc., a leading Canadian producer of high-quality cannabis products. Explore our commitment to innovation, quality, and sustainability in the cannabis industry.

faq.question: What does Organigram produce?
faq.answer: Organigram produces a variety of cannabis products, including dried flower, oils, and edibles.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Organigram?
faq.answer: Bev Oda is the CEO of Organigram Holdings Inc.

faq.question: Where is Organigram headquartered?
faq.answer: Organigram is headquartered in Moncton, New Brunswick, Canada.
